body: this anime needs more of these, i love the manga so much!
Coolio! I was the one who scanned this and put it on E-Hentai, glad to see it got uploaded here.
Better art than the original work. Akane is best girl, just let you know.

Fuck ya, this series has some sexy girls in it. The manga is fucking hilarious, it starts out kind of boring but it gets ridiculously absurd. Everyone in the manga is am idiot and it just adds to the hilarity. The anime looked good, but it was poorly executed, so I can't recommend it
